## ğŸ› ï¸ Customization Guide

### To Update Badge Style
Change `?style=` parameter:
```markdown
?style=flat          (default)
?style=flat-square   (modern)
?style=for-the-badge (bold)
?style=plastic       (3D effect)
?style=social        (with count)
```

### To Add Logo
Add `&logo=` parameter:
```markdown
&logo=npm
&logo=github
&logo=node.js
```

### To Change Color
Add `&color=` parameter:
```markdown
&color=blue
&color=brightgreen
&color=ff69b4
```
